meanings: hostility (to/toward), antagonism (toward/to), animosity (toward/against), (formal) antipathy (for/to/toward), ill feeling, bad feeling

vlive.korean: [정말 아쉽게도 춤에서 매력을 뽐내지 못한..] 여기서 반감이 되는데? [Unfortunately, he failed to show off his charms in dancing...] This is working against you. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.63
vlive.english: [Unfortunately, he failed to show off his charms in dancing...] This is working against you.

vlive.korean: 반감이 많았어요. people hated him. 듣기 View video 10PM : 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! Movie talk!talk!
달기만한 느낌을 조금 반감시켜 준다고 생각해서요. it's less sweeter than chocolate flavor. 듣기 View video C-JeS : 샤엘의 뮤지컬 <데스노트> 출근길~
vlive.english: it's less sweeter than chocolate flavor.

vlive.korean: 좋게 들렸는데, 이상하게 좀 약간 반감이 생겨요. I liked what he said but at the same time, I felt hostility. 듣기 View video 10PM : 양재진, 딘딘의 비정상담소 unusual counseling center
vlive.english: I liked what he said but at the same time, I felt hostility.

vlive.korean: 뉴썬이 반감을 가지지 않고 저에게 모두 맡기기로 했어요. NEW SUN won't have any hostility. And she'll let me use all of her face. 듣기 View video SONAMOO : 꽃보다소나무 (민재랑 놀자 - 올라프의 할.메)
vlive.english: NEW SUN won't have any hostility. And she'll let me use all of her face.

examples.korean: He felt no animosity towards his critics. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 자기를 비판하는 사람들에 대해 아무런 반감이 들지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He felt no animosity towards his critics. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Vague objections to the system solidified into firm opposition. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 제도에 대한 희미한 반감이 확실한 반대로 굳어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
